edge: Tyson signed for an extended cameo in the film, making his acting debut in Indian cinema.
Panday was cast opposite Deverakonda for the film.
Kapoor refused the offer due to dates issues, leading to Panday being cast instead.
Deverakonda played a MMA fighter with a stutter in the film and underwent a dramatic physical transformation for his role.
The film's score is composed by Mani Sharma.
Composer Tanishk Baggui is also signed for the film.
